ygData.subject: RE: Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t find this petition, can someone post it or give me the URL? To answer your question about accuracy, I think that it has something to do with your level
ygData.messageBody:
I can't find this petition, can someone post it or give me the URL?

To answer your question about accuracy, I think that it has something to do
with your level vs the level of the MOB, and your skill level in Archery.
Something like this:

Chance to hit = Skill Level * Modifier * ((Your Level - MOB Level) *
Modifier)

I am not certain whether either modifier is class dependant or level
dependant or both. But I am not sure that the equipment has a lot to do
with it, but what do I know, I didn't write the code. *grins*

Vapn, Master Fletcher, Povar


-----Original Message-----
From: Montu Dhillon [mailto:montu_dhillon@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 11:03 AM
To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Fletchers] stuff


From: "Montu Dhillon" <montu_dhillon@...>

Two questions:

We've all signed the petition at empty.com/rangers ... any word or idea if
changes are going to be made? I'd like to restart fletching soon.

Second, do arrows make a difference in accuracy? Or is it just skill. Cuz
as a master archer with a TS bow, I feel disappointed with my accuracy
sometimes. So if anyone knows the most accurate arrow ... or just the
component that makes arrows hit more often (bone shaft or small nock I
figure) please let me know.

Montu
